titleStmt.title: Clavis mystica a key opening divers difficult and mysterious texts of Holy Scripture; handled in seventy sermons, preached at solemn and most celebrious assemblies, upon speciall occasions, in England and France. By Daniel Featley, D.D.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R[obert] Y[oung] for Nicolas Bourne, at the south entrance of the royall Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Sheets 4G2.5 and 4H1.4 are cancels; 4G5v lines 18-19 have "For #5FD\ this objection"; 4H4r has errata. (In cancellandum 4G2.5, 4G5v lines 18-19 have "for #5FD\ some odiously object"; 4H4r lacks errata.).
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
